law.catch_line: Continuation of administration when powers of representatives cease.
law.text: When the powers of one personal representative cease, the remaining personal representatives may carry the trust into execution. If there is no remaining personal representative, an administrator de bonis non, or, if there is a will, an administrator with the will annexed, shall be appointed.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3845.
